clearGraphList

public void clearGraphList()
clears everything from the list of data to be graphed

addToGraphList

protected void addToGraphList(int[] selections)
adds selected spectra to the list of data to be graphed. this method only adds on basis of index, so if a selection is made and the data is sorted before this method is called, the selection will be invalid.

addToGraphList

public void addToGraphList(GraphableData d)
marks a data block for graphing and adds data blocks to list

marks a number of data blocks for graphing

removeFromGraphList

removes data blocks from list of data to be graphed

addToPropertyList

public void addToPropertyList(java.lang.String[] selections)
add an element to the list of selected spectra in the 'Graph' tab. the string that is added is the key for retrieving the appropriate GraphableData object.

clearPropertyList

public void clearPropertyList()
remove all items from the list used for editing properties

removeFromPropertyList

public void removeFromPropertyList(java.lang.String[] selections)
add an element to the list of selected spectra in the 'Graph' tab. the string that is added is the key for retrieving the appropriate GraphableData object.
